form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: United States Department of Justice Form G-135aA, Form G-135aA

full_text: Form G-135a Agency Name Check Copied (Rev. 8-1-60) at the UNITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE 132-P=17982 District Miami, Fla. Immigration and Naturalization Service File No. A10 891 711 Sub-office Place photograph in this space Date August 27, 1962 INVESTIGATIONS SECTION: Please conduct the requisite character investigation in the case of the following named person whose photograph is at- tached. Witnesses interviewed should be, preferably, United States citizens or aliens lawfully admitted to the United States for permanent residence. NAME (Surname in CAPS, First, Middle) DATE OF BIRTH SEX COLOR MARITAL STANDEL October 28, 1905 STATUS Herbert S M PLACE OF BIRTH (City, province or state PRESENT NATIONALITY Austria country) England D W ALIASES (Identify maiden name or nicknames) PARENTS NAMES (Include present address, if known) you nidtiw el nedlo HEIGHT WEIGHT EYES HAIR COMPLEXION IDENTIFYING MARKS OR SCARS (to 1st joints 6'2' 185 Brown Brown Fair Hiddle & index fingers left hand asputated RESIDENCE LAST FIVE YEARS (Street & No., RFD, etc.) (City, state and country) FROM TO 900 S. Highland Avenue, Clearwater, Florida. PRIOR RESIDENCES, IF AVAILABLE 1575 Palmetto Street, Clearvater, Florida EMPLOYMENT LAST FIVE YEARS (Employer's name and address) OCCUPATION OR PROFESSION FROM TO Senior Development Engineer PRIOR OCCUPATIONS (Not included in above) SPOUSE (Full name & other names used, & present address, if not same as above) DATE OF BIRTH lada Antonia nee BENETIK December 18, 1905 PLACE OF BIRTH (City, province or Caechos lovakia state & country) ORGANIZATIONS (Include any societies, clubs, etc., with which now or previously affiliated) None LAST ADMISSION TO U.S. (Date, port and status) PRIOR ENTRIES AND DEPARTURES (Dates and ports or if numerous, list years 4-27-57 Permanent - Detroit, Michigan. when previously in U.S.) PREVIOUS NUMBERS ASSIGNED (Milit. S/N; passport, social security; FBI; etc., ibellineV insmyoloms identify each) PREVIOUS REPORTS FURNISHED BY FBI: NO YES If yes attach list of reports. REASON FOR REQUEST DEPORTATION Other (Specify) APPLICANT FOR: PROCEEDINGS BENEF. PB #: ADM. TO U.S. ADJ. OF STATUS SPONSOR PB #: FOR RELIEF OF NATZ E-1-00 REMARKS: Please execute the report of the investigation on the reverse of this form and return it with any necessary attachments to the undersigned.
